name: substitutability
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the ability to use one thing or person instead of another: substitutability between Substitutability between different brands of chewing gum is relatively high, since they all satisfy the same need. substitutability of They assess the substitutability of two words as a measure of their similarity.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are elements of both substitutability and complementarity in the services provided by the two markets. The question implies a claim about the substitutability of younger for older workers.The measure gauges the substitutability between the two types of investments.
